entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
